BaseStackName.Description: The name of the base stack

LambdaFunctionName.Description: The name of the lambda function in the stack

ApiGatewayName.Description: The name of the API Gateway in the base stack

DynamoDBTableName.Description: The name of the DynamoDB table in the base stack

AWSRegion.Description: The AWS region where the stack will be deployed

AWSCredentials.Description: The AWS credentials for deploying the stack

AspNetConfiguration.Description: The ASP.NET configuration for the lambda function

MessageName.Description: The name of the message used in the lambda function

DomElementId.Description: The ID of the DOM element used in the lambda function

DataSchema.Description: The data schema for the DynamoDB table

ApiGatewayPath.Description: The path under the base API Gateway for the lambda function

PowerShellScriptName.Description: The name of the PowerShell script for deploying the stack
